content.text:
female soaks him up. He was obeyed because, first of all, he knew how to impose this voluptuousness on himself.
And could I not have expressed my impression simply with this assertive exclamation: “Yes, but so what?” or with that apologia for action contained in his motto: “In order not to sleep.”25

document.title: Adventures of the Mind
document.author: Natalie Clifford Barney, John Spalding Gatton
